description: Support for the Development of a National Statistical System

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
Support for the development and implementation of a coordinating framework for the production of accurate, consistent, relevant and reliable national statistics  (the collective set of output that are produced and released within the statistical system) for enhanced evidence-based development policy formulation and programming. Expected outputs include: 

- Gap Analysis on the Statistical System in Jamaica
- Statistical Master Plan
- Code of Ethics/Practice
- Advocacy Strategy to improve the culture and confidence in Statistics
- Guidelines for Establishing Administrative Data sets to be used for Official Statistical Purposes
subproject.title: Support to Nat'l Stats System
